title: Account permently suspended
body: my account has been "permanently suspended" and i haven't received an email explaining or anything, im wondering if anyone else has had this problem and thinking it might be a glitch?

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up and it looks like there may have been some abnormal activity going on. I don't want to give out any personal information here on the boards, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can fill you in on everything there!
